game.name: PAYDAY 2: Sydney Character Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Anarchy isn’t just a watered down symbol on a t-shirt...The Sydney Character Pack is the 34th DLC for PAYDAY 2. Heisters can now play as the furious Sydney. It also contains the Anarchist Perk Deck together with the Bootleg Assault Rifle and Wing Melee Knife.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Anarchy isn’t just a watered down symbol on a t-shirt...The Sydney Character Pack is the 34th DLC for PAYDAY 2. Heisters can now play as the furious Sydney. It also contains the Anarchist Perk Deck together with the Bootleg Assault Rifle and Wing Melee Knife.
